base.enabled=true
cni.enabled=false
egressGateways[0].enabled=false
egressGateways[0].k8s.env[0].name="ISTIO_META_ROUTER_MODE"
egressGateways[0].k8s.env[0].value="sni-dnat"
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.maxReplicas=5
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.metrics[0].resource.name="cpu"
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.metrics[0].resource.targetAverageUtilization=80
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.metrics[0].type="Resource"
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.minReplicas=1
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.scaleTargetRef.apiVersion="apps/v1"
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.scaleTargetRef.kind="Deployment"
egressGateways[0].k8s.hpaSpec.scaleTargetRef.name="istio-egressgateway"
egressGateways[0].k8s.resources.limits.cpu="2000m"
egressGateways[0].k8s.resources.limits.memory="1024Mi"
egressGateways[0].k8s.resources.requests.cpu="100m"
egressGateways[0].k8s.resources.requests.memory="128Mi"
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[0].name="http2"
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[0].port=80
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[0].targetPort=8080
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[1].name="https"
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[1].port=443
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[1].targetPort=8443
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[2].name="tls"
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[2].port=15443
egressGateways[0].k8s.service.ports[2].targetPort=15443
egressGateways[0].k8s.strategy.rollingUpdate.maxSurge="100%"

istiodRemote.enabled=false
pilot.enabled=false
pilot.k8s.env[0].name="POD_NAME"
pilot.k8s.env[0].valueFrom.fieldRef.apiVersion="v1"
pilot.k8s.env[0].valueFrom.fieldRef.fieldPath="metadata.name"
pilot.k8s.env[1].name="POD_NAMESPACE"
pilot.k8s.env[1].valueFrom.fieldRef.apiVersion="v1"
pilot.k8s.env[1].valueFrom.fieldRef.fieldPath="metadata.namespace"
pilot.k8s.readinessProbe.httpGet.path="/ready"
pilot.k8s.readinessProbe.httpGet.port=8080
pilot.k8s.readinessProbe.initialDelaySeconds=1
pilot.k8s.readinessProbe.periodSeconds=3
pilot.k8s.readinessProbe.timeoutSeconds=5
pilot.k8s.strategy.rollingUpdate.maxSurge="100%"
pilot.k8s.strategy.rollingUpdate.maxUnavailable="25%"
